name: Huck n Hubble
description:
Are you ready to run at the drop of a hat?

Poor ole Huck has crash landed on a distant planet and lost his helmet. Luckily, Hubble is here to help! Unfortunately, the oxygen transfer leaves Huck immobile. Throw your new hat Hubble and get ready to run for it — but watch out! If Hubble hits the surface before you can catch him, or if the evil Bubble Bane catches up to you, it's...POP!

Made for Github Game Off 2022. Theme: Cliche
Chosen cliche: "At the drop of a hat"

___ Controls

Aim the reticle and click to throw
A & D keys to move left and right
Spacebar to jump (hold to jump higher)

___ Credits

Game by Kenny Murphey (ChefPancake) and Em Handy
Programing/Level Design: Kenny Murphey (ChefPancake)
Graphics/Art Direction: Em Handy
Soundtrack: Jake Handy
Sounds: Epic Sounds and FX (hit), Nox_Sound (footsteps)
